abstract: Mitsubushi Motors announces it will stop production at its only American factory and close the plant, which is located in Normal, Ill, and employs more than 1,200 workers.
lead_paragraph: The move will make Mitsubishi the first Japanese automaker to stop production in the United States and Europe.

headline.main: Mitsubishi to Stop Production at Only U.S. Plant
headline.print_headline: Mitsubishi to Stop Production at Only U.S. Plant

snippet: The move will make Mitsubishi the first Japanese automaker to stop production in the United States and Europe.
